org.apache.twill.kafka.client

Interface BrokerService

  • All Superinterfaces:
    com.google.common.util.concurrent.Service

    public interface BrokerService
extends com.google.common.util.concurrent.Service
    Service for providing information of kafka brokers.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static class  BrokerService.BrokerChangeListener
      Listener for changes in broker list.

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from interface com.google.common.util.concurrent.Service

        com.google.common.util.concurrent.Service.Listener, com.google.common.util.concurrent.Service.State

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Cancellable addChangeListener(BrokerService.BrokerChangeListener listener, Executor executor)
      Adds a listener to changes in broker list managed by this service.
      String getBrokerList()
      Returns a comma separate string of all current brokers.
      Iterable<BrokerInfo> getBrokers()
      Returns a live iterable that gives information for all the known brokers.
      BrokerInfo getLeader(String topic, int partition)
      Returns the broker information of the current leader of the given topic and partition.

      • Methods inherited from interface com.google.common.util.concurrent.Service

        addListener, awaitRunning, awaitRunning, awaitTerminated, awaitTerminated, failureCause, isRunning, start, startAndWait, startAsync, state, stop, stopAndWait, stopAsync

    • Method Detail

      • getLeader

        BrokerInfo getLeader(String topic,
                   int partition)
        Returns the broker information of the current leader of the given topic and partition.
        Parameters:
        topic - Topic for looking up for leader.
        partition - Partition for looking up for leader.
        Returns:
        A BrokerInfo containing information about the current leader, or null if current leader is unknown.

      • getBrokers

        Iterable<BrokerInfo> getBrokers()
        Returns a live iterable that gives information for all the known brokers.
        Returns:
        An Iterable of BrokerInfo that when Iterable.iterator() is called, it returns an iterator that gives the latest list of BrokerInfo.

      • getBrokerList

        String getBrokerList()
        Returns a comma separate string of all current brokers.
        Returns:
        A string in the format host1:port1,host2:port2 or empty string if no broker has been discovered.

      • addChangeListener

        Cancellable addChangeListener(BrokerService.BrokerChangeListener listener,
                            Executor executor)
        Adds a listener to changes in broker list managed by this service.
        Parameters:
        listener - The listener to invoke when there is changes.
        executor - Executor to use for invocation to the listener.
        Returns:
        A Cancellable to stop listening.
